Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I'm extending this exclusive offer to you at a special price of $110. Don't miss out on this opportunity to enhance your experience with our product. If you're interested, please let me know and we'll proceed with the transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $110.

(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $110
